Attention:
Checking links may take up to several minutes. Checking ONE link can last up to 3 seconds.
Choose the level of pages to check and press "Refresh display" to show the results.
You can update the stored results by pressing "Check links". Note that this process can take some time.
Alternatively you can also configure the %sTYPO3 Scheduler%s to update the stored results regularly.
Alternatively your administrator can also configure the TYPO3 Scheduler to update the stored results regularly.
